text:
United Income | Brand New FinTech Startup | Full Stack Engineer - Node and/or Python background | Onsite in Washington, DC | Full Time

We all are coming from a very successful startup that exited about 2 years ago. We have a great team and are continuing to hire. Currently looking for a talented full stack engineer with a background/degree/passion in Math or Finance along with experience in Node and/or Python. Stack includes React, AWS (Serverless - API Gateway/Lambda), Node, Python, and more! More information about us here: https://unitedincome.com/

Email david@unitedincome.com
